name: MegaMan: Citrus Cult
storyline:
In the year 20XX...

Dr. Wily has renounced his evil ways! In a public press conference, he admitted that he's never really wanted to build robots. Ever since he was young, he has wanted to be the head of a manufacturing company, he says. Dr. Light and Megaman are suspicious. however, no harm or evil schemes were revealed for several years. In that time, Wily Manufacturing Co. has become a leader in home appliances and everyday apparel. Dr. Light, in fear of his old age, hires a talented young assistant, Dr. Dangus, PhD. Soon, Dr. Light looses supiscion of Dr. Wily's manufacturing company and settles down into his robotics production business with no fear for the fate of the world.

Before long, Dr. Wily releases a new chain of home applainces. He calls it the "Citrus Line" for unknown purposes.

Months later, a rouge group of robots calling themselves the "Citrus Cult" begin terrorizing the world! Dr. Light is suspicious of Wily and accuses him of creating these monsters. Wily feigns his innocence, but that doesn't impress Dr. Light. Of course, MegaMan is sent to clean up the mess.
